title: Nice Location direct at the Marina
text:
The Barong is located direct at the waterfront of Zea Marina in Pireas. It is really nice to sit and sea the sailing boats.
The staff is really friendly and helpful. The dishes have a good size and are very tasty. The price level is a little above average but affordable, you pay a little surcharge for the nice location. Many young people are going there.

title: Wonderful location with excellent service
text:
The bistro is in a small street close to Syntagma square.
The bistro offers a good choice of breakfast and brunch opportunities with high quality. Our breakfast was really so tasty and good. The service is excellent and very friendly at a very high level. The prices are economic.
We will come back höre

title: Amazing and impressing location
text:
To visit the Acropolis is really mandatory to be at this ancient location. The entrance fee is 20€ but for kids it is free. I you need a guide you can them near the ticket office.
Enjoy the awesome view from the Acropolis

title: Real must for wine lovers
text:
The Winepoint is located close to the Acropolis museum in a small street.
Here you have a wide selection of Greek and other wines. The waiter gives good recommendation. You can also get side snacks with the wines. You can have Glases of wine (starting with 7€) or full bottles.
A very nice location to enjoy wines in Athens.

title: Very nice charming hotel in the City Center
text:
The Kimon Hotel is located about 400 m from Syntagma Sq in a side street. To this Plaka it is just 200 m.
The hotel is small but very charming. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel offers no breakfast but in distance of 50 m you can find a nice tavern. The hotel has no elevator what is a real challenge when you get a room in third floor and you have heavy luggage.
The roof garden with Acropolis view is very nice. The hotel is very nice to explore Athens.
